rules_text:
Return all creatures with toughness 3 or less to their owners' hands.
Investigate three times. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Wash them all away and let the Pact sort it out.”
—Iskji, Simic hydromancer[/i]
